page_content: The page provides information about the logistics of elections and referendums in the canton of Zurich, including voting materials, processes, and legal bases.

The page details the introduction of a new French teaching material "dis donc!" for secondary schools, including its structure, methodology, digital learning platform, and implementation schedule in the canton of Zurich.

The page outlines the air quality requirements for machines and devices depending on their purpose, age, and fuel type, specifically focusing on diesel soot regulations and emission controls in various industries, including construction and other industrial areas in the canton of Zurich.

The page provides information about the Zurich tax book, including guidelines, circulars, and practical notes. It also offers tools like a tax calculator and contact details for tax offices in the canton of Zurich.
